description:
Momoka`s horoscope says that Fuyuki will have the chance to invite her to the hot springs today, and if she misses this chance, her love is doomed.  So she sets up an elaborate plan to manipulate him into inviting her.  But of course, all does not go according to plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro part en thalasso / Keroro et Arthus font une promenade
Momoka vs Koyuki Onsen Soudatsu Battle de Arimasu / Keroro & Fuyuki Mattari Iko! de Arimasu
桃華VS小雪 温泉争奪バトル であります / ケロロ & 冬樹 まったり行こっ であります
